sections.heading: Applicability of chapter
sections.text:
This chapter shall only apply to those counties having a metropolitan form of government with a population of more than five hundred thousand (500,000), according to the 2000 federal census or any subsequent federal census.Acts 1978, ch. 871, § 5; T.C.A., § 65-3402; Acts 2005, ch. 6, § 1.

sections.heading: "Utility" defined
sections.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires, "utility" means any utility which furnishes electricity, gas or water, or converts solid waste into heat, fuel or energy.Acts 1978, ch. 871, § 2; T.C.A., § 65-3403.

sections.heading: Policy governing discontinuation of service for nonpayment of service
sections.text:
The utility governing body, in conjunction with the utility management team, shall establish a policy governing the discontinuation of service for nonpayment of service. The policy must be in compliance with service practice standards and best practices for similarly situated utilities.Amended by 2019 Tenn. Acts, ch. 237,s 1, eff. 7/1/2019.Amended by 2013 Tenn.
